attributes.additional_details: With criminals, money-grabbing businesses, (including DVLA and other Government Depts.), stealing or selling, and using our personal information for profit it makes sense for all of us to copy-right our names and personal details the same as show-biz and sports people can and do. If any one wishes to sell on our personal details then they should pay us, and back-date this privilege, ( except for security services), I want the Government to enshrine this request in law.
